name: Divine Darkness
description:
To Play HTML5 version Please use this Secondary Client

https://simmer.io/@GameLordzzz/divine-darkness

Fuse the Player with The Shadow to Complete the Level and Solve Tricky and not So Frustrating Puzzles.

WASD to Move

Stay on same Tile for 3 moves results in Game Over.

E To Teleport

Team

Art, Game Design, BGM Sound By Prothom Pal

Development, Programming By Rishabh Jain

No Sound Effects because we ran out of Time. 

NOTE

If the game doesn't run on HTML5, Download the Archive according to your system.
